user_query: I want to organize a casino-themed party for my birthday and I need some interesting facts about roulette to entertain my guests. Can you provide me with the histories of the last 30 spins and the details of the latest outcome? Also, could you check if a specific word I came across is vulgar or not?

TaskList.description: Retrieve the history of the last 30 spins of a roulette game.
Fetch the details of the latest outcome of a roulette game.
Check if a specific word is vulgar or not.
